page.title: 04INDUSTRY NEAR WYMESWOLD
page.content: { Hawker Siddeley Power Engineering {Ltd.}Employs 200 people designing power stations on an old RAF site for the last 25 years. { Hawker Siddeley Electric Export {Ltd. (Fusegear Division).}On old RAF site for 15 years. Employs 280 people making industrial high-voltage fuses. { Wymeswold Industrial Estate.}Found on the old RAF airfield. Occupied by a grain store, a garage (doing repair work) and a firm which reclaims waste polythene and plastic raw materials. { Pig Development Ltd.}Bred 5500 pigs on RAF Campsite for past 13 years, employing 5 people. { Sturdee Poultry Farm, Burton on the {Wolds,}employ 4 people for 160000 hens in broiler houses which are bred for meat & taken away live. c25 years. { The Old Parsonage Boarding Kennels, {Hoton.}Board dogs & breed Great Danes.
